member.name: M:WorldsNomadApi.Controllers.v1.SequenceController.GetSpecialNumberSequence(System.Int32)
member.remarks: All numbers up-to and including the number entered, except 'C' when multiple of 3, 'E' when multiple of 5 and 'Z' when multiple of both 3 and 5
